tweet.text: Madeleine Korbel Albright served as the 1st woman and 64th U.S. Secretary of State from 1997 to 2001. Nominated by Pres. Clinton, Albright was unanimously confirmed by the Senate. Today, we highlight key moments related to her life and federal service. https://t.co/sNimj7YoUV https://t.co/DQlXqP5Hsm
